bug.author: daixiangzi
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
A clear and concise description of what the bug is. <denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
set model.py ONNX_EXPORT = True python3 convert.py convert.py: from models import * # set ONNX_EXPORT in models.py from utils.datasets import * from utils.utils import * device = torch_utils.select_device(device='cpu') model = Darknet('cfg/yolov3-tiny.cfg', (416,416)) weights = '/home/dxz/code/yolov3/weights/best.pt' if weights.endswith('.pt'): # pytorch format model.load_state_dict(torch.load(weights, map_location=device)['model']) else: # darknet format load_darknet_weights(model, weights) model.to(device).eval() model.fuse() img = torch.zeros((1, 3,416,416)) # (1, 3, 320, 192) f = weights.replace(weights.split('.')[-1], 'onnx') # *.onnx filename torch.onnx.export(model, img, f, verbose=True, opset_version=11) pytorch version is 1.4.0 python version is 3.7
Error: AttributeError: 'YOLOLayer' object has no attribute 'grid'

comments.comment: Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/daixiangzi>@daixiangzi</denchmark-link> , thank you for your interest in our work! Please visit our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/Train-Custom-Data>Custom Training Tutorial</denchmark-link> to get started, and see our <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1G8T-VFxQkjDe4idzN8F-hbIBqkkkQnxw>Google Colab Notebook</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://hub.docker.com/r/ultralytics/yolov3>Docker Image</denchmark-link> , and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/GCP-Quickstart>GCP Quickstart Guide</denchmark-link> for example environments. If this is a bug report, please provide screenshots and minimum viable code to reproduce your issue, otherwise we can not help you.
if i set model.py line 146,self.training = False, the error is solved,i doubt in set where self.training?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/daixiangzi>@daixiangzi</denchmark-link> thanks for the bug report. This should be fixed now in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/commit/b6959a2f54dcfb713a7b024255faf3b60e66257f>b6959a2</denchmark-link>
This issue is stale because it has been open 30 days with no activity. Remove Stale label or comment or this will be closed in 5 days.
